sentences.en: 'Everybody missed her,' Stan said with a hangdog look.
sentences.cn: “大家都想念她，”斯坦面带愧色地说。

sentences.en: "Everybody missed her," Stan said with a hangdog look.
sentences.cn: “大家都想念她，”斯坦面带愧色地说。

sentences.en: After he got out of jail , he always had a hangdog look.
sentences.cn: 他出狱后, 总是一副羞愧的神色.

sentences.en: For Moore, a former prosecutor a tinge of Hal Holbrook's hangdog air, such speeches are painful.
sentences.cn: 对摩尔而言, 这位前检察官学着哈尔·霍尔布鲁克卑躬屈膝的样子, 这种讲话是痛苦的.

sentences.en: I could tell from his hangdog look that things had gone badly.
sentences.cn: 我从他难过的表情中看出情况很不好。

sentences.en: Mr. A must have done something terrible because he has a hangdog look today.
sentences.cn: 先生一定做了什麽大错事,因为他今天有羞愧的脸色.

sentences.en: Original, a lot of moment, it is him hangdog of one's previous experience looks low oneself.
sentences.cn: 原来, 很多时候, 是出身卑微的人自己看低了自己.

words.tran_cn: 鬼鬼祟祟的；卑躬屈膝的；忧愁的；悲哀的
